nodes.text: S7-U44 is a vendor droid active during 1 ABY of the Galactic Civil War. A heavily customized protocol droid that had a red hull on its head and hands, and a heavily customized body patterned after a tuxedo, it frequently set up shop in a tent directly northeast of the Theed Hangar at Theed, Naboo, as well as at Coronet a short distance away from a spaceport.
S7-U44 is a character introduced in Star Wars Galaxies Update 13, where it sold wares in exchange for tokens awarded during the Chronicles missions.
